title: Bilingualism and Schooling
description: Introduces participants to issues related to the schooling of students who speak languages other than or in addition to English. Uses a multidisciplinary perspective to understand the circumstances these students face in schools and considers approaches and policies that best meet their needs.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to junior and senior education, democracy and justice majors, science education majors, STEM & EDUC minors, or by permission of instructor.

class_notes: All students can enroll - prerequisites and restriction review is waived in summer.
